tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE neural_network_training_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    input_data FLOAT[],
    output_data FLOAT[]
)

CREATE TABLE neural_network_weights (
    weight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    weight_value FLOAT NOT NULL,
    side INT NOT NULL,
    layer_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (layer_id) REFERENCES neural_network_layers(layer_id)
);
